description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the dashboard screen of a healthcare management app. It includes a main DashboardScreen widget rendering a scrollable view with several info cards displaying upcoming consultations, recent records, and tips. It also defines a private _InfoCard widget used within the dashboard to display individual info sections.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the dashboard screen, displaying a scrollable layout with header and info cards.

classes.name: _InfoCard
classes.description: A private stateless widget used within DashboardScreen to display a titled info card with a subtitle.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for DashboardScreen, incorporating theme styling and layout widgets.

methods.name: _InfoCard.build
methods.description: Builds a styled card widget displaying the title and subtitle passed to it.
